jobDescription: Job DescriptionTalen Energy is currently seeking an experienced Senior Quantitative Analyst to join our growing team in our Woodlands, TX office! Please see below for the essential functions and qualifications! Please use this opportunity to upload your resume, cover letter, and any relevant documents .
